column2: an A.M. Eatery////Ham Benedict III was amazing as well. Snooze is not kidding when their menu describes a "perfectly poached egg" under the description because the egg was indeed poached to perfection. When you cut your fork through the layer of hollandaise
column5: the egg yolk oozes out and spills down your tower of Benedict goodness. Perrrrrfect. I wasn't so big on the hash brown patty/cake that came along
